name: Dr. Dodson House Bed & Breakfast

reviews.title: Wonderful weekend at the Dr. Dodson B&B
reviews.text: We had a very relaxing and enjoyable weekend. This is an outstanding B&B in a great location close to the town's main attractions and the Bay. The Hosts were fantastic taking care of our every need and added great tips about where to eat, drink and shop. The breakfasts were delicious (french toast, eggs benedict, pecan waffles, fruit). The comfortable rooms had everthing you could want plus TV and wireless. The decor of the house takes you back to the end of the 1800s. We were really spoiled and would love to come back.

reviews.title: A romantic Valentine's present my wife can't stop raving about.
reviews.text: I surprised my wife with a weekend trip to St. Michael's the weekend after Valentine's Day. I really knew nothing about St. Michael's, so I picked Dr. Dodson House after reading the reviews.

reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
reviews.text: After our stay, all we can say is "wow." Ok, so a few more word than that.

reviews.title: Delightful
reviews.text: Janet was an excellent host and a delight to talk to. And her warmth and charm translates into the feeling we had staying there. The decor of the house was fantastic and whimsical, with that sort of elegance that comes through without pretense.

reviews.title: An wellspring of charm and comfort!
reviews.text: The Dodson room is the biggest, and boy was is comfortable. The fireplace came in handy since it was a cold rainy Saturday.

reviews.title: Great area with great people
reviews.text: My husband & I just celebrated our 20th wedding anniversary at Dr. Dodson's B & B. We both have traveled to many places in the states & in Europe. The one thing I have found is that it is not always the actual place you stay at that makes it great, but the people who are running it & the other guests that are there. Ben & Jaime are the best!!! They make you feel like you are old friends and are delightful to talk with. The breakfast was delicious & I would not have changed a thing. They also are right on with their recommendations for places to dine & drink. Will definitely go back in the near future!

reviews.title: You won't have better experience anywhere else!
reviews.text: We stayed at Dr. Dodson's for one night this past weekend. It was my husbands first expereince at a B&B and it was a great one and definitely my best one! We were greated by Ben and he gave us a tour of the place which was really pretty and clean and then he provided us with our choices for breakfast the next day (all of which were delicious). He and Jaime both have such great personalities and made us feel very comfortable throughout our stay. They really made sure you had everything you needed. We stayed in the room on the very top floor of the house. The bed was comfortable and the room was decorated very nicely. They also have a great second floor balcony where you can enjoy a nice glass of wine and people watch before heading out for the evening. Location is great and you can walk everywhere. We would definitely stay here again during our next visit to St. Michaels.

reviews.title: Excellent Location, Hospitality, and Accommodations!
reviews.text: Dr. Dodson's #1 ranking on Trip Advisor is well deserved and comes as no surprise to anyone who has stayed there. The Dr. Dodson House is centrally located and within walking distance to restaurants, shops, and the Maritime Museum. The innkeepers, Ben and Jaimie, are super warm and friendly. As soon as you walk through the front door, they make you feel right at home. We stayed in the Dodson room, which is the largest of the three rooms. The room was extremely clean, and we slept well in the super soft bedsheets. The updated marble shower had a rain shower head, which was a pleasant surprise. Ben and Jaime's recommendation's for dinner was very helpful. The fish tacos and crab nachos at Gina's were delicious! In the morning Jamie and Ben provided two options for breakfast, caramel french toast with almonds or eggs benedict. It was the hardest decision I had to make all vacation. Luckily, my wife ordered one and I ordered the other. Ben cooked them perfectly! We cleaned our plates. The coffee was excellent, as well. After breakfast, we borrowed the house bikes and made a big loop around the entire town. We could only stay for one night, but we will definitely stay longer in the future. The Dodson house was the perfect getaway location for some R&R.

reviews.title: Great Stay
reviews.text: A nice stay in St. Michaels. This B&B is off the main street and is very quiet. The place was spotless and our room,Dr. Dodson's, was very comfortable. The Breakfasts were delicious. Ben and Jaime, the Innkeepers, are so friendly and outgoing. Just a short walk down the street to the Bay.

reviews.title: Fabulous Stay at Dr. Dodson's
reviews.text: We arrived and were pleasantly surprised at the wonderful rooms in this B&B. It was so clean! It was like a museum---beautiful portraits, furniture, live plants.

reviews.title: Perfect Accommodations
reviews.text: My husband and I celebrated his return from a deployment with a two night stay at the Dr. Dodson House this past weekend. It was just perfect! We arrived later than expected but Ben was happy to accommodate us and make us feel welcome. He also gave us wonderful dining recommendations. The Harbor View room was wonderful--very cozy and a nice view of the water. Everything was clean and the breakfasts were delicious! Fresh fruit, orange juice, coffee and the tomato cheese tart and banana pecan waffles were such a treat! Jaime remembered talking to me on the phone when I described the nature of our getaway and specifically wanted to make sure we had a great reunion stay. We didn't move the car all weekend, which was awesome. Thanks for such a perfect weekend!

reviews.title: Wonderful place to stay
reviews.text: My husband and I just spent two nights at the Dr. Dodson House and thought it was great. Ben & Jaime, the innkeepers, are both extremely warm and friendly and made us feel at home. The Inn was very clean (which is extremely important) and comfortable, and is just a really charming spot. Breakfast was cooked to order, and the food was incredibly good. We were very pleased with our choice and would definitely go back again.

reviews.title: Like Being Home
reviews.text: My wife and I spent two great nites and morning breakfasts at this homey bed and breakfast near the Chesapeake Bay. The accommodations were historic and comfortable and the breakfasts were absolutely fantastic thanks to innkeepers Jaime and Ben. Our two days were full of things to do and we didn't have to move the car. Good times.

reviews.title: The absolute best bed and breakfast bar none.
reviews.text: My wife and i celebrated our 20th here at Dodson House and it was fantastic. From the hospitality of Jamie and Ben. To the scrumptious breakfasts. The rooms were beautiful as well as homey. We just couldn't ask for better hosts. We made lifetime memories as well as friends. Their recommendations for restaurants as well hit the jackpot. We will definitely return very soon.

reviews.title: So fine!
reviews.text: What a wonderful visit Ben and Jaime provided. Ben's cooking is fabulous--as good as the best breakfast place you could want for. Jaime tops it off with the warmest smile and friendly greeting to start your day right.

reviews.title: Best Bed & Breakfast Experience Yet
reviews.text: My husband and I love traveling to new locales and staying in cabins and B&Bs. We live in Arlington, VA and when looking for a new spot to explore, we couldn't believe we had never traveled to St. Michael's. We'd heard about Dr. Dodson's and loved the location, rooms and "feel" of the place before we even checked in. Upon arrival, we knew we chose the right spot. Jaime and Ben are the warmest, most generous hosts. From the greeting to the suggestions we got on places to eat and visit, to THE MOST AMAZING breakfast we were well taken care of. The rooms were also just perfect. We stayed in the Harborview Room, which was so cozy - especially over a rainy weekend. We will definitely be back.

reviews.title: Such a relaxing getaway
reviews.text: My husband and I just celebrated our second wedding anniversary at Dr. Dodson House, and we couldn't be happier with our choice of this B&B. The house, location, breakfast, and innkeepers are amazing. The house is a historical landmark and highlight of several guided tours, so we learned a lot about it just by listening to tours from the porch. The innkeeper gave us great suggestions about where to go for food and drinks, especially Gina's lighthouse tacos! Everything in St. Michaels was within .5 miles from Dr. Dodson House so we didn't have to drive anywhere during our entire stay. We would definitely stay here again!

reviews.title: Our Best B & B Experience!
reviews.text: My husband and I are newly married and decided to come to St. Michaels for a short and sweet honeymoon. The Dr. Dodson House was recommended to us by some friends, and we are so glad we listened! The property is absolutely beautiful and very classic, not to mention the location cannot be beat. We stayed in the Harbor View room which has beautiful updated decor and a very cozy king size bed. We only left the room the following morning because breakfast smelled so good that we could not pass it up. Ben and Jaime are a very sweet couple and you can tell they love what they do as much as they love the town- Ben's blueberry crepes were delicious, and if you get a chance to eat his Eggs Benedict, you won't be disappointed! They also made great recommendations for other places to eat and hang out around town, which helped us have a great stay. We definitely plan on returning soon, and we would certainly recommend this to others.

reviews.title: Great Location
reviews.text: My wife and I had booked 2 weekend nights. Unfortunately, Hurricane Sandy forced us to leave one night early. However, our abbreviated stay couldn't have been better. The breakfast was wonderful and we could walk to any of the sights/restaurants in town. Ben and Jamie were very friendly and accommodating and did not charge us for the lost night because of the hurricane; I hope they survived OK because we would like to return one day.

reviews.title: Great Breakfast - the rest was so-so
reviews.text: My partner and I struggled with this review somewhat just because we liked Ben and Jamie so much and we wanted to give them a glowing, 5 star (or 5 TripAdvisor green circles), 10 out 10 review but we couldn't.

description: Dr. Dodson House offers five-star hospitality and the perfect location for exploring St. Michaels. We are just steps from the harbor and one block away from the great shops and restaurants on Talbot Street. History buffs will appreciate the c.1799 brick home's original features, including doors, woodwork, fireplaces, and wavy glass. Beautifully appointed guest rooms, lovely gardens, the second-story porch and delicious breakfasts have delighted guests since 1994.
